text: Stavros (, Stavrós) is a village and beach in the Akrotiri district of the city of Chania, Crete, Greece. The beach and surroundings was the place where in 1964 Michael Cacoyannis partly made the movie Zorba the Greek with Anthony Quinn. file:DE Akrotiriou.svg |Akrotiri district file:AQ Zorba el Griego.jpg | Anthony Quinn as Zorba Category:Populated places in Chania (regional unit)
title: Stavros, Chania
